channel.title: Post your Character
channel.description:
[u][b][size=15pt]Show off your Runescape character [/size][/b][/u]
[u][b]Rules[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Provide plausible proof that you own the account otherwise you will not be taken seriously and your post may be removed.[/li] [li]You do not have to post your username or all of your levels (They may be blanked out).[/li] [li]Follow the usual forum rules, and be nice.[/li][/ul]
Also feel free to comment on each other’s levels, though I may prune these posts later if they are finished with and answered to make it a smaller and more readable thread.
This sticky is here for people whom just want to post their runescape levels and look at other regular forum users accounts.
[b] Please remember I will remove most posts without pictures to save space on this thread.[/b]

item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:7225, topic:205532”]Dude look at the date it was posted.

item.title: Post your Character
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Soulcist, post:7224, topic:205532”][quote author=naseem142 link=topic=271213.msg4474753#msg4474753 date=1425068244]


[/quote]You made me literally tear up.

what the fudge is that? That can’t be RS… made be cringe.

Either it isn’t RuneScape and he’s using a client with a lot of options to help him with something OBJECT wise or he’s using a bot (EpicBot, Powerbot etc.) and he’s using the bot’s client options to view the OBJECT IDs and so on.

I’m going to assume the second one lol.[/quote]

Dude look at the date it was posted.
Can almost guaranty it’s a bot client or similar.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your Character
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[/quote]You made me literally tear up.

what the fudge is that? That can’t be RS… made be cringe.[/quote]
Either it isn’t RuneScape and he’s using a client with a lot of options to help him with something OBJECT wise or he’s using a bot (EpicBot, Powerbot etc.) and he’s using the bot’s client options to view the OBJECT IDs and so on.

I’m going to assume the second one lol.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your Character
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:7213, topic:205532”][quote author=Soulcist link=topic=271213.msg4474162#msg4474162 date=1424756364]

Completed the new quest today

I will be uploading a quest guide for it as well on youtube and will link appropriately at a later time.

Was it fun?
[/quote]

I thought it was. Definitely isn’t like any other quest. It’s also lore heavy, which I also like.[/quote]^ THIS

Very lore heavy,but also well thought out. I had some issues on the door puzzle at first but then I noticed they had the map upside down on me on the interface.

If you like stealth stuff this is a quest for you honestly. I also suggest staying in melee distance of the guy.

Read full topic

item.title: Post your Character
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

I would love to get in RuneScape as much as I used to be like five or so years ago, but it’s so complicated now or at least seems to be. RuneScape used to be VERY easy I guess I could say but now it seems like it’s complicated with all these new and improved things that would take me what might be ages to figure out lmao.

Anyway, here’s a picture of my character…

Read full topic
